Articles.Content:
I've been playing KSP for a while, and I was wondering if a mod existed that would call out telemetry at given time intervals, for example, vehicle velocity, altitude, thrust, etc. Almost like Flight Engineer but with a voice component to it. Does this exist yet? Would this even be feasible to accomplish?

i.e. something like the audio and script used during commercial/government launches starting roughly 5 seconds prior to main engine ignition. Like this, minus the commentator. https://youtu.be/Pl3x71-kJGM?t=1m15s

Edited March 15, 2015 by sumghai
[MOD - Moved to General Add-on Affairs, as this is the place for making requests]

There's Cockpit Warning Notifications.

Also check out the Kerbal Sound Overhaul Project
